articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets Lao Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Mongolian Embassy Officials Visit Koksan County, North Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Mongolian Embassy Officials Visit Koksan County, North Hwanghae Province
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Lombo Khash-Erdene, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Mongolian embassy here, and his embassy officials visited Koksan County, North Hwanghae Province on Thursday.
					 They looked round the area in which more than hundred heads of cattle donated by the Mongolian government to the DPRK last year are quarantined.
					
					 The charge d'affaires ad interim recalled the Mongolian government's decision to donate a large quantity of domestic animals to contribute to the development of stockbreeding base in the area of Sepho of Korea.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and the Korean people would achieve greater success in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Effort to Water Storage
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Effort to Water Storage
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has directed much effort to the storage of water to prevent the damage from drought in this year's farming.
					According to data available, 57,670 projects were carried out to keep water in store throughout the country from October last year to mid-February this year.
					
					They included the construction of tens of reservoirs, 44,000 wells, 5,000 water pockets, 3,740 barrages, 1,400 cisterns, 900 small reservoirs and 1,600 tube-wells.
					
					 Different provinces of the country are now carrying on more projects to keep in store water as much as possible for the smooth farming.

articles.title: Education for Gifted Students in DPRK
articles.content:
Education for Gifted Students in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has paid big attention to education for gifted students.
					 President Kim Il Sung underscored the need to improve the education in basic sciences and foreign languages, supply modern educational equipment to schools and build schools for gifted students in different parts of the country during his visit to Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 on February 26, Juche 74 (1985).
					
					 Upholding the noble intention of the President, leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that schools for gifted students were built and took measures for improving gifted students education.
					
					 Over the past several decades, signal successes have been witnessed in the education for gifted students.
					
					 Many students have proved successful in national and international competitions including the international math Olympiads.
					
					 Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung and won the title of Thrice Honored Red Flag for producing over 70 holders of academic degrees. 
					
					 Under the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un, greater importance has been attached to the education for gifted students in the DPRK. And a large number of students have received education at those schools, full of ambition to make great contributions to turning the country into a knowledge-based economic power.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Quake and Volcano Held
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Quake and Volcano Held
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of quake and volcano took place here on Feb. 26 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 It was attended by scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and officials of Kim Il Sung University, Bureau of Earthquake, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the Geology Institute, Global Environmental Information Institute, Pyongyang Observatory and the Architectural Science Institute of the Architectural Engineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 Its participants heard dozens of papers dealing with scientific and theoretical issues arising in ensuring the accuracy and speed in observing earthquake and volcano and providing information about them. 
					
					 They also heard papers introducing successes made in distributing various types of observation networks as required by natural and geographical features of Korea and developing reality and updating quake observation equipment at a high level.

articles.title: Seminar in Field of Media Held
articles.content:
Seminar in Field of Media Held
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar in the field of media at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday to study and grasp the tasks set forth in leader Kim Jong Il's work "Journalists and Other Media Persons Are Buglers Sounding Advance in Dynamic Drive for Building a Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation" and thoroughly implement the tasks.
					 It was attended by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, journalists and media persons in the field of media here.
					
					 Speeches were made by Ri Yong Sik, editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun; Kim Ki Ryong, first vice-chairman of the Korean Central Broadcasting Committee and director of the Television Broadcasting Service; Ji Yu Gon, director and editor-in-chief of the Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House; Rim Ho Ryong, vice general director of the KCNA; and Ri Yong Chol, director and editor-in-chief of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House.
					
					 Speakers said that the work serves as a great programme for the media in the 21st century as it helps remarkably increase the militant might of the media of the WPK and as important guidelines for the journalists and media persons to perform their missions and duties as standard bearers and buglers for advance on the ideological front of the party in the on-going general charge.
					
					 They called on the media to perform their pioneers and educators' roles in thoroughly establishing the monolithic leadership system of the Party Central Committee throughout the party and society and powerfully arousing all service personnel and people to the campaigns to implement the party ideology and uphold the party policies.
					
					 They underlined the need to produce varieties of scientific and technological books and magazines and intensify the dissemination of sci-tech information and thus focus efforts on encouraging all people to build the country into a sci-tech power.
					
					 They underscored the need to have proud voices of faith, will and justice of Songun Korea heard all over the world by using preeminent strategy and iron logic.

articles.title: Symposium on Sports Science Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Sports Science Held
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A symposium on sports science was held at the Weightlifting Gymnasium in Chongchun Street, Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 It was attended by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials, coaches, teachers and researchers in the fields of sports and social science.
					
					 The floor was taken by Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Jon Ha Chol, director of an institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, Mun Jae Dok, president of the Academy of Sports Science, and Yun Song Bom, chairman of the Sports Technique Federation.
					
					 The speakers said that the Workers' Party of Korea set forth the idea of conducting sports matches in a guerrilla-style and by offensive method.
					
					 This idea develops in depth the Juche-based principles and methods of matches from a new angle and serves as an engine helping attain the high goal of a sports power, they noted.
					
					 They underlined the need to further round off diverse tactics and methods, develop sports science and technique and positively apply new research achievements to practice.
					
					 They called upon all players to win Asian and world titles and fully demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Korean Aviation Sports Rapidly Develops
articles.content:
Korean Aviation Sports Rapidly Develops
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Nearly seven decades have passed since the Korean Aviation Association was founded in December, 1945.
					 Korean aviation sports has made rapid progress under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 DPRK players took part in international aero model contest in 1975 with model planes made with their indigenous technology and equipment and materials, winning six gold medals and three bronze medals. 
					
					 In particular, they placed first in the individual and group contests of rubber-propelled model planes of the World Aero Model Championship that year.
					
					 In the contest, Paek Chang Son won a world title and bagged a rotating cup, gold cup and gold medal.
					
					 Son Kye Phil came first in the 800-meter accuracy landing event in the International Parachute Contest held in 1980, and DPRK players won the gold medal in the men's group accuracy landing event of the Sixth Asia and Oceania Parachuting Championship.
					
					 DPRK players demonstrated high aero model plane manufacturing technology and skillful control at the International Free Flying Aero Model Contests for Mongolian Cup in 2010 and 2011.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jun placed first at the men's individual accuracy landing event and women players proved successful at the women's group accuracy landing event in the 16th Asia Parachuting Championship and the 2014 Indonesia International Open Tournament held last year.
					
					 Korean aviation sports is greeting a new heyday in its development.

articles.title: Production of Saplings on Sharp Increase
articles.content:
Production of Saplings on Sharp Increase
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- 250,000 saplings of good species have been produced at the Central Tree Nursery of the Ministry of Urban Management of the DPRK.
					 Among them are saplings of dawn redwood, gingko tree, zelkova tree and other tall trees good for street greening and yellow magnolia, silk tree, juniper tree and other four year-old trees to be planted at parks, recreation grounds and residential quarters.
					
					 The Central Tree Nusery has made full preparations to plant saplings at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, construction site of the Science and Technology Center, the Pyongyang Folklore Park and the Mausoleum of King Tangun, on both sides of railways, around dwelling houses and at parks and recreation grounds.

articles.title: Film Show Held to Mark Day of Defenders of Motherland
articles.content:
Film Show Held to Mark Day of Defenders of Motherland
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A film show was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Feb. 26 on the occasion of the Day of Defenders of the Motherland.
					 It was attended by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned and citizens here.
					
					 Present at the event were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Its participants watched a Soviet feature film.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Japanese Dietman's Reckless Remarks over Central Hall of Chongryon
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Japanese Dietman's Reckless Remarks over Central Hall of Chongryon
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Maehara, member of the House of Representatives from the Japan Democratic Party, at the House Budget Committee on Feb. 20 picked up the issue of the Central Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and charged it with "evasion of law".
					 This was an intolerable and despicable act to stop Chongryon from using the hall by misleading the public opinion in Japan as it was revelation of an ulterior intention to prevent the long controversial issue from being smoothly solved.
					
					 Maehara let loose such string of invectives at a time when everyone admits that the legal procedures and steps on the issue of the hall by Chongryon is not a breach of law. This makes one cast doubt about whether he has elementary thinking faculty as a human being, to say nothing of qualifications as a politician.
					
					 He claims to have graduated from the law faculty of Kyoto University and held the post of foreign minister during the Democratic Party rule. But he found fault with the hall though it poses no problem from the legal point of view. This only proves that he is a political illiterate devoid of elementary international common sense and concept of law.
					
					 The advance sale of the hall and its lease are a universal transaction pursuant to procedures recognized by law and, therefore, everything is done in a legitimate manner free from any "violation and evasion of law".
					
					 Not only the legal circle but the political and media circles of Japan admit this.
					
					 It is free for anyone to sell or lend a real estate which one purchased through auction. On the contrary, it is illegal to interfere in it without any justifiable reason.
					
					 There were precedents in which purchaser of a real estate lent it to the debtor, its original owner, and such a precedent still exists at present.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that Maehara groundlessly attributed the bankruptcy of the Credit Association of the Korean Bank to the "remittance of funds to North Korea" and "the organized use by Chongryon of the DPRK", while crying out for tightening watch and investigation into it and demanding relevant data.
					
					 This is an absolutely intolerable malignant accusation against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 As known, the bankruptcy of the Bank was caused because it failed to set up proper management strategy to cope with the bubble economy just as was the case with lots of banks and credit associations that went bankrupt in Japan. 
					
					 The then Prime Minister Koizumi on Dec. 2001 made it clear in a "reply to questions regarding the issue of Korean Bank operation fund" that "the government has not admitted the flow of fund to the North Korean authorities from the Credit Association of the Korean Bank and that there has not been information about a grant of fund."
					
					 Even a "report by a person in charge of financial management" at the time of bankruptcy of the Bank mentioned insufficient counteraction and heavy loans but not the admittance of "organized use" when referring to the major causes of the bankruptcy.
					
					 However, Maehara claimed that the "Resolution and Collection Corporation and the reserve insurance organization could seize lease fee by exercising all mandates and Chongryon should not be allowed to continue to use the Central Hall", a hysteric frenzy of a man steeped in bad blood towards the DPRK and Chongryon to the marrow of his bones.
					
					 Such a despicable aim to physically deprive Chongryon, an organization defending the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan, of the base for its activities and to stamp out the legitimate activities of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan can never be achieved.
					
					 Maehara's reckless remarks reflect his foolish attempt to fuel atmosphere of bitterness towards the DPRK and Chongryon in the Japanese society, chill the climate of the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental talks and improve his clout as a politician from an opposition party.
					
					 By nature, he is an imbecile political philistine bereft of any political idea and ability and is like a political migratory bird who stoops to any infamy to gain his popularity in the political camp.
					
					 As for the issue of improving the relations between the DPRK and Japan, he blustered that "no chance should be given to the former."
					
					 He is a henchman and war servant for the U.S. steeped in sycophancy toward the U.S. While extolling the U.S. as a "guardian of peace" and "stability" in the Asia-Pacific, he said the U.S. sub-critical nuclear test was not in contravention of the "Prague address" made by the U.S. chief executive and voiced "understanding of it".
					
					 He was also forced to step down as foreign minister as he violated the laws and regulations on political funds which ban the acceptance of political fund from foreigners.
					
					 Such a human reject questioned the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental talks while raising the Central Hall issue and made remarks chilling the atmosphere of the talks, a vivid manifestation of his sinister political purpose to check the advance of the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, Chongryon is a genuine overseas Koreans' organization active for defending and realizing the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan, and the Central Hall of Chongryon is an inviolable base for its activities as it plays the role of foreign mission in the absence of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 Maehara had better face up to the trend of the times and stop such folly as hurting his image.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Regime's Crimes against National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Regime's Crimes against National Reunification
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article discloses the crimes committed by the Park Geun Hye regime against national reunification while pursuing the "policy toward the north" veiled with the spurious word of "confidence" over the past two years.
					 The "policy toward the north" touted by the present south Korean regime is the one for deteriorating the inter-Korean relations from A to Z, the article says, adding:
					
					 As soon as the puppet group came to power, it worked with bloodshot eyes to "tighten the alliance" with the U.S. for invading the north, talking about "confidence-building between the south and the north".
					
					 The south Korean authorities have zealously played the role of a shock brigade in their master U.S. nuclear racket against the DPRK, openly crying out for "policy cooperation" with the U.S., seized with a wild daydream like the "collapse of the north." Consequently, they have pushed the inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe.
					
					 The puppet authorities came out with "the doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" and the "Dresden declaration" in a bid to advertise "dialogue" for them and deceive the public opinion at home and abroad, while shunning the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They resorted to dastardly moves to put into practice the confrontation of the two differing social systems while malignantly hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK. This was a factor of pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst catastrophe.
					
					 They frantically kicked up the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket and were busy with psychological warfare including leaflet scattering operations. In the meantime they busied themselves forming "preparatory committee for unification" and instituting a "charter for unification" in a bid to back up the confrontation of social systems legally and institutionally. 
					
					 With no rhetoric can they cover up the above-said crimes committed over the past two years.
					
					 What has happened in that period teaches a serious lesson that there can be neither dialogue nor the improved relations between the north and the south unless the south Korean authorities roll back their policy of confrontation against reunification, the article concludes.

articles.title: Protest against Japan's Moves for Grabbing Tok Islets Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against Japan's Moves for Grabbing Tok Islets Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- An event of the "day of Takeshima (Tok Islets)" was held in Shimane Prefecture, Japan on Feb. 22 with a vice-ministerial government official attending.
					 Members of the Tok Islets Fellowship Society and other civic organizations and students of south Korea held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Sunday to denounce Japan's moves for grabbing Tok Islets as evidenced by the above-said event.
					
					 Members of the organizations related to Tok Islets also held a rally condemning Japan's shameless moves to grab the islets before the Japanese embassy on the same day, at which they demanded Japan cancel the institution of the "day of Takeshima" and stop at once the moves for tampering with history through textbooks.
					
					 A written protest addressed to the Japanese prime minister was thrust to the Japanese embassy.
					
					 One-to-one demonstrations took place on Sunday.
					
					 Press conferences were held in North Kyongsang Province on Feb. 23 to denounce Japan's attempt to grab Tok Islets.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to bear in mind that it will meet a disgraceful doom if it persists in the reckless moves to realize its ambition to grab territory of other country while denying its war crimes.

articles.title: Halt to Joint Military Exercises Demanded by S. Korean Bodies
articles.content:
Halt to Joint Military Exercises Demanded by S. Korean Bodies
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War of south Korea held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 24 demanding a halt to the large-scale joint military exercises against the north, according to an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers said that the south Korean and U.S. authorities are describing Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises as "annul ones for defense" but in actuality they are war drills aimed to occupy the north.
					
					 They noted that they would launch peace actions for a halt to the war drills and build up public opinion against war.
					
					 On Feb. 23 the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty issued slogans for peace against war which call for opposing the joint military exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet forces.
					
					 In the slogans the organization said that the situation on the Korean peninsula is again inching close to a touch-and-go situation with the approach of the resumption of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 There is no hope for the improved inter-Korean relations amid the joint military exercises, the organization said, calling for an immediate halt to them which will bring a nuclear war and national ruin.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop at once cooperation for war with the U.S. as it bedevils the inter-Korean relations through interference in the internal affairs and north-targeted war drills.
					
					 It called upon all people to turn out in the actions to check the moves for war drills and realize peace against war and protect the people's life and security by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was laid with due ceremony before the portraits of smiling  President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at Kim Jong Il Class of Primary School No. 2 in Kuwazana, Zimbabwe on Feb. 16.
					 Teaching staff and pupils of the school placed the floral basket before the portraits at the classroom and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Then followed a lecture titled "His Excellency Kim Jong Un translating the lifetime desire of His Excellency Kim Jong Il into reality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian, Malaysian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian, Malaysian Papers
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Russian and Malaysian papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Russian paper Priamurka on Feb. 11 carried an article titled "Immortal exploits performed for peace" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper introduced facts that he displayed rare grit and pluck as a brilliant commander in military confrontation with the U.S. imperialists such as armed spy ship Pueblo case, large spy plane EC-121 case and Panmunjom incident.
					
					 Recalling that he frustrated the U.S. imperialists' nuclear war moves by dint of Songun, the paper noted the feats he performed for the cause of global peace would always be remembered by mankind.
					
					 The Feb. 4-10 issue of the Russian paper Pravda Primoriya carried articles titled "Future of DPRK is bright and rosy" and sub-titled "Characteristic of Kim Jong Un's politics" illustrated with photos documenting revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper elaborated on his wise leadership, noting that his politics is based on his firm decision and faith and unpredictable elaborateness and profound thinking.
					
					 The Malaysian Guang Ming Daily on Feb. 9 edited an article titled "The Day of the Shining Star in the DPRK" accompanied with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos of Kimjongilia and his birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 The paper praised the feats he performed by leading the party and his Songun leadership exploits, noting that he dedicated his whole life to carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Cambodian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Cambodian Media
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Cambodian media carried special write-ups or aired special programs on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The paper Kmae Amata on Feb. 5 carried an article titled "Great master of independent politics" accompanied with his photo.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il was the great master of independent politics specially recorded in the world history of politics.
					
					 His political philosophy is the Juche idea recognized by the international community as the guiding idea of the cause of independence, it noted and went on:
					
					 Songun politics is the most important of his political exploits.
					
					 He considered independence, peace and friendship as his foreign policy tenet and paid deep attention to building a new independent world, conducting energetic activities to strengthen the anti-imperialist independent forces of the world.
					
					 The might of his independent politics and vitality of his Songun politics were fully displayed in the fact that the grandiose June 15 era of reunification guided by the idea of By Our Nation Itself was ushered in.
					
					 The F.M. 90.5 Radio and Apsara Television and Radio aired a program praising his immortal Songun leadership feats on Feb. 5 and 6.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's exploits took place in Uganda, Egypt, Poland and Austria on Feb. 12 and 14.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos documenting his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 On display there were works of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speakers of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and Makerere University of Uganda praised Kim Jong Il as a peerlessly elder statesman and a military genius who developed and enriched and applied to practice the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, saving the world socialist  cause and the cause of independence from a crisis, and foiled the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist reactionaries to bring down socialism and stifle the DPRK and developed the DPRK into a military power.
					
					 Speakers of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea spoke highly of the undying exploits he performed for the socialist cause and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chief of the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association lauded Kim Jong Il as a peerless patriot and benevolent father of the people who devoted his all to the country and its people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Speakers of the Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Austria praised him for frustrating the maneuvers of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK with his Songun revolutionary leadership and laying a firm groundwork for building a thriving nation.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Poland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on Feb. 19.
					 The work, published on Feb. 25, Juche 103 (2014), clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a period of ideological work to give full play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates tasks facing the field of the party's ideological work at present and ways of carrying out them.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Blasts U.S. Inhuman and Unethical Brutalities
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Blasts U.S. Inhuman and Unethical Brutalities
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Feb. 16 posted on its website an article condemning the U.S. inhumane and unethical brutalities.
					 The article recalled that tortures practiced by the CIA were exposed in the U.S. last year.
					
					 The inhuman and medieval tortures were systematically practiced by the CIA in a premeditated manner with the approval of the U.S. president and under his patronage, the article said, adding this proves that the U.S. is the worst human rights abuser and the world's biggest grave yard of human rights.
					
					 The fact that the CIA secretly arrested people and made no scruple of committing all sorts of tortures against them clearly shows how inhuman and unethical the U.S. system and standards of human rights are, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Such tortures disclosed last year are nothing new and they are just a tip of the iceberg of the unethical crimes committed by the U.S., a typical human rights abuser, in different parts of the world in the last period.
					
					 It is the height of hypocrisy that the U.S. is desperately pulling up other countries over their "human rights issues".
					
					 The authorities of the U.S. administration having extreme repugnancy towards the DPRK are besmirching even the UN arena through their frantic "human rights" racket. This cannot but be a mockery of all its member nations.

articles.title: Miembros de embajada de Mongolia visita el distrito de Koksan
articles.content:
Miembros de embajada de Mongolia visita el distrito de Koksan
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- El encargado de negocios a.i. Lombo Khash-Erdene y otros miembros de la embajada de Mongolia en Corea visitaron el dia 26 el distrito de Koksan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					Los visitantes recorrieron una zona del distrito donde estan apartadas mas de cien vacas donadas el ano pasado por el gobierno de Mongolia a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El encargado de negocios subrayo que su gobierno decidio donar muchos cabezas de ganado para contribuir al desarrollo de la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho de la RPDC.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y el pueblo coreano lograra mayores exitos en la lucha por construir un Estado prospero.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia disparate de Maehara sobre la Casa Central de la Chongryon
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia disparate de Maehara sobre la Casa Central de la Chongryon
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 20, el representante de la Dieta por el Partido Democratico de Japon, Maehara, cuestiono en la comision presupuestaria de la camara de representantes el problema de la Casa Central de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) como "evasion de ley". 
					Este intolerable proceder parte del malsano intento de inducir en error la opinion publica de Japon e impedir el uso continuo de la Casa Central por la Chongryon. 
					
					En estos momentos todo el mundo reconoce que los procesos juridicos sobre el problema de la Casa Central de la Chongryon no contravienen a la ley. 
					
					El disparate de Maehara, graduado de la facultad de derecho de la Universidad de Kyoto y ex canciller durante el mandato del Partido Democratico, demuestra que el es iletrado politico que no tiene conocimientos elementales internacionales ni la concepcion del derecho. 
					
					El acaparamiento y arrendamiento de la Casa Central de la Chongryon se tratan de negocios generales acorde al procedimiento legal. 
					
					Lo conoce tanto el circulo juridico como el politico y la prensa de Japon. 
					
					Son libres la venta y la renta de bienes inmuebles comprados a traves de la subasta. Y la intervencion injusta en ellas resulta una violacion de la ley.
					
					El comprador de bienes inmuebles puede alquilarlos al deudor. 
					
					Diciendo que la bancarrota de la Asociacion de Credito del Banco Coreano se debe al "envio de dinero al Norte de Corea" y es "desvio organizado de fondos por la Chongryon", Maehara demando intensificar la supervision e investigacion sobre el respecto y presentar los datos relacionados. Es intolerable este disparate anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon. 
					
					Como es conocido por todos, la bancarrota de la Asociacion de Credito del Banco Coreano se debe a la erronea estrategia empresarial para hacer frente a la economia vulnerable, al igual que muchos bancos y asociaciones de credito fracasados en Japon. 
					
					Maehara difundio el rumor erroneo de que fueron invertidos enormes fondos publicos en el renacimiento de la Asociacion de Credito de Banco Coreano, pero, los fondos publicos se pagan en virtud de la ley y en el principio de proteger a los depositadores de todos los organos bancarios que pagan la prima observando la ley de proteccion de deposito. 
					
					En diciembre de 2001, el entonces premier japones Koizumi aclaro en la "respuesta sobre fondos publicos del Banco Coreano" que "el gobierno no reconocio nunca el flujo de los fondos desde la Asociacion de Credito de Banco Coreano al Norte de Corea ni la falta de sus fondos". 
					
					El "informe del arreglador financiero" publicado en el momento de la bancarrota de la Asociacion de Credito de Banco Coreano tampoco reconocio el "empleo organizado de fondos para otros fines". 
					
					Es irrealizable la ilusion de eliminar en lo fisico la base de actividades de la Chongryon, defensora de derechos democraticos nacionales de los coreanos residentes en Japon, y exterminar las actividades legitimas de la Chongryon y los coreanos en Japon. 
					
					El disparate de Maehara refleja su absurdo intento de aumentar el ambiente anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon, congelar las conversaciones intergubernamentales RPDC-Japon y elevar su prestigio como politico opositor. 
					
					Este comerciante politico carente de ideal politico y capacidad se vale de todos los metodos y medios para ganar la popularidad politica. 
					
					En cuanto al tema de la mejora de las relaciones RPDC-Japon, disparateo que "no deben dar una oportunidad a la RPDC". 
					
					Este sirviente pronorteamericano alabo a EE.UU. como "defensor de paz" y "preservador de estabilidad" de la region de Asia-Pacifico. Cuando el imperio norteamericano realizo la prueba nuclear subcritica, "expreso el entendimiento" diciendo que "no contraviene al discurso de Praga del mandatario norteamericano".
					
					Este tipejo fue destituido del cargo de canciller por haber violado el reglamento sobre los fonos politicos que prohibe recibir la donacion extranjera.
					
					La Chongryon, siendo organizacion de compatriotas en ultramar de la RPDC, actua para defender y lograr los derechos democraticos nacionales de los coreanos residentes en Japon. Y la Casa Central de la Chongryon es la base de actividades que cumple el papel de representacion diplomatica en Japon que no tiene las relaciones diplomaticas con la RPDC. 
					
					Maehara no debe buscarse la caida de su popularidad viendo correctamente la tendencia de la epoca.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes anti-reunificacion de dos anos de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes anti-reunificacion de dos anos de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este jueves un articulo revelando los crimenes anti-reunificacion del poder surcoreano de Park Geun-hye cometidos durante dos anos despues de su mandato embalando su "politica sobre el Norte" con la mascara de "confianza". 
					La "politica sobre el Norte" de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas se dirige a romper las relaciones intercoreanas, critica el articulo y continua:
					
					Tan pronto como tomaron el poder, los titeres surcoreanos hablaban del "establecimiento de confianza entre ambas partes coreanas" mientras se desesperaban por consolidar la "alianza" con Estados Unidos para agredir a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Actuaron como brigada de choque del alboroto nuclear anti-RPDC de su amo norteamericano insistiendo sin escrupulos en la "cooperacion en politica" con el imperio enloquecido por la ilusion de "derrumbe del Norte". De esta manera, llevaron a la fase irreparable las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas preconizan la doctrina de "Thong-il Taebak" (cajon de tesoros para la reunificacion) y la "Declaracion de Dresden" despreciando la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre para enganar la opinion publica interna y externa. 
					
					Calumnian brutalmente la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC con el malsano intento de hacer el enfrentamiento de sistemas. 
					
					Recurren con frenesi a la campana intrigante de "DDHH", el lanzamiento de volantes y otras intrigas psicologicas anti-RPDC, y al mismo tiempo, se entregan a fundar el "comite preparatorio de unificacion" y elaborar la "carta de unificacion" a fin de apoyar en lo juridico e institucional el enfrentamiento de sistemas. 
					
					Pero, con ningun pretexto pueden ocultar sus crimenes de haber llevado a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas cometiendo durante dos anos de su mandato el servilismo a las fuerzas extranjeras, las maniobras de provocacion de guerra anti-RPDC y el enfrentamiento de sistemas. 
					
					La realidad de dos anos pasados nos da la seria leccion de que ambas partes coreanas no pueden lograr ni el dialogo ni la mejora de las relaciones bilaterales mientras las autoridades surcoreanas no retiren su politica de enfrentamiento anti-reunificacion.
